title: The owner of our club is gone
body: Club owner hasn't been on for a year. Need to transfer ownership of club to someone else to keep the tag and add members.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If anyone can help you, they can.

Reply or submit another ticket. 

If the ticket was lost in the queue somehow, then simply replying to it will reset it. If it was closed then presumably it was because it was resolved as best they could and you already have your answer.
